dct_title_s: A plan of the city and environs of New York : as they were in the years 1742-1743 and 1744
dct_description_sm: Covers lower Manhattan. Facsimile. "Copied from an original drawing by David Grim in the possession of the N.Y. Historical Society for D.T. Valentine's Manual, 1854." Includes index to points of interest and 13 inset views of local buildings.
dct_publisher_sm: [New York : Common Council, 1854] (N[ew] Y[ork] : Lith. G. Hayward)
